title: One Piece Episode 1 Analysis - The Beginning of an Epic Journey
author: GrandLineReview
description: An in-depth analysis of the first episode of One Piece, examining the themes, character introductions, and foreshadowing present in Luffy's debut.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers up to Alabasta arc

title: The One Piece Podcast - Episode 1 Review
author: The One Piece Podcast
description: The crew reviews the very first episode of One Piece on its 20th anniversary, discussing its cultural impact and how it set up the series.

title: How One Piece's First Episode Changed Anime Forever
author: Crunchyroll Editorial
description: An editorial piece examining the cultural impact of One Piece's debut episode and how it influenced shonen anime for decades to come.
